title: Patrick Mouratoglou is Working to Reboot Tennis
itunes:title: Patrick Mouratoglou is Working to Reboot Tennis
description:
Coaching one of the world's all-time great athletes and creating Europe's biggest academy has helped make Patrick Mouratoglou one of the most influential voices in tennis. He goes in-depth about his new, super-charged circuit (the Ultimate Tennis Showdown), building the Mouratoglou Academy from the ground up, working with Serena, and the next generation of superstars in his stable.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
